mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getRentFeeList */ SELECT a.booth_id boothId, b.booth_name boothName, b.rent_fee_type rentFeeType, d.code_name rentFeeTypeName, b.pay_onsite payOnsite, c.group_id groupId, c.group_name groupName, a.rent_year rentYear, a.rent_month rentMonth, a.rent_amount rentAmount, a.rent_percent rentPercent, a.modify_dt modifyDt, a.create_dt createDt FROM ptm_rent_fee a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT group_id, booth_id, booth_name, rent_fee_type, pay_onsite, use_yn FROM ptm_booth_info ) b ON b.booth_id = a.booth_id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT group_id, group_name, use_yn FROM ptm_booth_group ) c ON c.group_id = b.group_id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code_value, code_name FROM frwk_cmm_code WHERE system_cd = 'PHOTOME' AND category_cd = 'RENT_PAY_TYPE' ) d ON d.code_value = b.rent_fee_type WHERE b.use_yn = 'Y' AND c.group_id = #{groupId} AND a.booth_id = #{boothId} AND a.rent_year = #{rentYear} AND a.rent_month = #{rentMonth} AND b.rent_fee_type = #{rentFeeType} AND b.pay_onsite = #{payOnsite}

/* QUERY ID : getRentFeeInfo */ SELECT a.booth_id boothId, b.booth_name boothName, b.rent_fee_type rentFeeType, d.code_name rentFeeTypeName, b.pay_onsite payOnsite, c.group_id groupId, c.group_name groupName, a.rent_year rentYear, a.rent_month rentMonth, a.rent_amount rentAmount, a.rent_percent rentPercent, a.modify_dt modifyDt, a.create_dt createDt FROM ptm_rent_fee a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT group_id, booth_id, booth_name, rent_fee_type, pay_onsite, use_yn FROM ptm_booth_info ) b ON b.booth_id = a.booth_id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT group_id, group_name, use_yn FROM ptm_booth_group ) c ON c.group_id = b.group_id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code_value, code_name FROM frwk_cmm_code WHERE system_cd = 'PHOTOME' AND category_cd = 'RENT_PAY_TYPE' ) d ON d.code_value = b.rent_fee_type WHERE a.booth_id = #{boothId} AND a.rent_year = #{rentYear} AND a.rent_month = #{rentMonth}
mapper.insert: /* QUERY ID : registRentFeeInfo */ INSERT INTO ptm_rent_fee(booth_id, rent_year, rent_month, rent_percent, rent_amount) VALUES (#{boothId}, #{rentYear}, #{rentMonth}, #{rentPercent}, #{rentAmount})
mapper.delete: /* QUERY ID : deleteRentFeeInfo */ DELETE FROM ptm_rent_fee WHERE booth_id = #{boothId} AND rent_year = #{rentYear} AND rent_month = #{rentMonth}
